channel.title: Portal Help
channel.description:
How can I make a portal teleport me somewhere, I still can't figure this out when I add.
Error: [code=java][client-1-Jack]: serverobjs size 0 [client-1-Jack]: atObject: 3229,3220 objectID: 2465[/code]
Here is my code in [b]ClickingMost.java[/b] [code=java]case 2465: c.triggerTele(3223, 3223, 0); c.sM("you have been teleported to lumby"); break;[/code]

item.title: Portal Help
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

It’s delta you dope and I’ve figured it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Help
item.dc:creator: @cardguydude cardguydude
item.description:
@cardguydude wrote:

after you add the portal in object manager.java go to actionhandler.java and add this in
like heres an example:

portal id = 2472

                             case:2472
                                    c.getPA().movePlayer(coords, coords, height);
                                     break;

Read full topic

item.title: Portal Help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“SacredHeart, post:1, topic:404045”]How can I make a portal teleport me somewhere, I still can’t figure this out when I add.

Error:

[client-1-Jack]: serverobjs size 0 [client-1-Jack]: atObject: 3229,3220 objectID: 2465

Here is my code in ClickingMost.java

case 2465: c.triggerTele(3223, 3223, 0); c.sM("you have been teleported to lumby"); break;[/quote]

Did you compile?

Otherwise, what option index are you using? I also thought that “ClickingMost” was for buttons and stuff. Not object interaction.

Read full topic
